resources.string: Using Spriv 2FA you will not need to interact with your mobile phone every time you login, Spriv authentication occurs automatically in the backgound.

Spriv is the only security company that offer automatic authentication solutions using the mobile phone without the need for manual user intervention.

Users love Spriv because it’s totally seamless, Spriv’s authentication works automatically in the background and requires no human intervention. Users simply login as usual or provide their username and password as they normally do and Spriv authenticates the information in the background multiple times and in multiple ways without any additional action by the user.

Spriv transforms the mobile phone into an automatic second hardware verification tool. There is no need for any additional equipment. There is no need to interact with the mobile phone and there are no costly tokens to administer.

Simply, Spriv is online, automatic and active invisible protection. Spriv provides security for both the user and the website provider during online transactions. After simple activation, every transaction runs seamlessly in the background.

Please provide your feedback:


We've profiled your phone information below. It will help us figure out what went wrong if there was a problem.
Please enter the six digits code as presented in Spriv\'s enabled site.\nThe code will be used to uniquely correlate your mobile phone with your username. To test, go to
Tip: Connect to WiFi for Automation and faster performance!
Your phone will automatically approve future requests from this location.
Please enter the six digits number you received via SMS or web
Ignite the fastest two factor authentication 2nd channel in the world:

By design, Spriv only uses minimal battery power and internet data transfer, the data transfer and battery are used only during authentication. Spriv is among the lowest battery usage of any 2FA method.
B. Privacy: No user private data is transferred.
How Spriv\'s automated two factor authentication works:

Each time you allow a transaction via Wi-Fi the cell phone generates a unique wireless identifier using Spriv\'s patented technology. This wireless identifier acts as a fingerprint which is unique to the devices being authenticated and has precise 3D gelocation accuracy where the transaction took place. This revolutionary 2FA 2nd Channel allows future transactions who\'s fingerprint has already been approved to be automatically validated and securely approved without the need for subsequent user interaction. Automated transactions can occur in as little as 175 milliseconds! Yes that\'s righ, 2FA 2nd Channel, no user interaction and well below one second.
Next Steps: To test and create a new free account.

A. From your PC: Create a new company account. Go to http://spriv.com and click on “Signup”. Currently, access to Spriv’s management portal is compatible with the following browsers: Chrome, Explorer, Opera and Firefox.
B. Follow the new account instructions and pair your mobile phone with the new account.
C. Once pairing is completed, from your PC: logon to Spriv’s management portal in order configure your 2FA platform. Go to http://spriv.com and click on “Client Login”
D. From your PC: You can now send invitations to your users and start using 2FA via the management portal.

Users: Spriv is a Two Factor Authentication platform that requires your System Administrator to first install Spriv on the server. If you are a regular user, please contact your system administrator for instructions.
Adoptive risk based authentications is ON
